Item.Name: Arctic Expeditions
Item.Content:
Arctic Expeditions in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Arctic Expeditions

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001546.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Keep on trekking ‘til you see this meals-on-wheels snowmobile near the Chairlift—then, delight your appetite with a cheese steak sandwich, chicken gyro or harvest salad, and top it all off with a thirst-slaking frozen blue raspberry lemonade!
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Item.Name: Avalunch
Item.Content:
Avalunch in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Avalunch

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001258.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Don’t let your hunger slide. Get a grip with specialty hot dogs, salads, desserts, chips, draft beer and soft drinks.

  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Cooling Hut
Item.Content:
Cooling Hut in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Cooling Hut

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002227.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Thaw out in the heat with a frozen treat that’s nice and sweet, like a Mickey’s Ice Cream Bar. Or, head off your hunger with something much warmer, including soft pretzels and popcorn. Beverages both hot and cold are also available.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Frostbite Freddy's Frozen Freshments
Item.Content:
Frostbite Freddy's Frozen Freshments in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Frostbite Freddy's Frozen Freshments

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/113666.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Don’t get stranded without scrumptious treats and snacks! Make tracks for this snow-capped chalet and chill with an icy-fresh orange swirl, or fill up on a turkey leg or loaded nachos—before washing it down with a soft drink or alcoholic beverage!
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Lottawatta Lodge
Item.Content:
Lottawatta Lodge in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Lottawatta Lodge

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001827.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Get a lotta grub at this alpine chalet—cheeseburgers, sandwiches, flatbreads, wraps, salads and more—while chilling out with a draft “brew-ski.” All-day refillable mugs and hot and cold drinks are also available
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

Item.Name: Mini Donuts at Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park
Item.Content:
Mini Donuts at Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Mini Donuts at Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001307.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
These mini treats are big on taste! Dip in by the dozen or half dozen with raspberry, chocolate or white chocolate sauce. Soft drinks, frozen lemonade, coffee, tea and hot chocolate are also available from this stand near Lottawatta Lodge.
  Cuisine: American

WDWNT Reviews

Item.Name: Polar Pub
Item.Content:
Polar Pub in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Polar Pub

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002049.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Get frosty at this full-service beach bar after making waves at Melt-Away Bay! Chill out with a cold one—including cocktails like the Angry Snowball as well as the icy Piña CoLAVA or Blue Blizzard, along with bottled and draft brew-skis.
  Cuisine: American

Item.Name: Warming Hut
Item.Content:
Warming Hut in Disney's Blizzard Beach Water Park, Disney's Blizzard Beach, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Warming Hut

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002364.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Thaw out with a hearty rice bowl—including Chicken Teriyaki or zesty favorites like Carne Mechata and Feijão com Arroz e Galinha. Add an empanada, egg roll or sweet treat for an extra cost, and then ice it down with bottled beer or sangria.
